snippet.title: Conversational Actions overview - Actions Builder & Actions SDK
snippet.description:
Users can invoke Conversational Actions to fulfill their requests with a conversation when using the Google Assistant. In this video, we go over how Actions are invoked, how a conversation works, and how you can connect web services and apps for additional functionality

Conversation Actions overview → https://goo.gle/2XUUSCJ 

Actions Builder & Actions SDK playlist → https://goo.gle/3bEPTtg 
Subscribe to Google Developers → https://goo.gle/developers
tags: build Actions for the Google Assistant
